entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
